participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to sing and play.
participant_1.background: I am in the third grade. I love to go to Disney World every year. I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character. I play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Active and health-conscious, enjoys sports and a balanced lifestyle.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is blue. I enjoy sports such as running. I'm married. I am a vegetarian.

content.text: I like playing sports and I really enjoyed running what abou
